name: ICDownloadOption
desc: An option for downloading a file from the camera.

items.name: static let downloadsDirectoryURL: ICDownloadOption
items.desc: A writable directory where the downloaded files should be saved.

items.name: static let saveAsFilename: ICDownloadOption
items.desc: The name to be used for the downloaded file.

items.name: static let savedFilename: ICDownloadOption
items.desc: The actual name of the saved file.

items.name: static let savedAncillaryFiles: ICDownloadOption
items.desc: An array of files associated with the file being downloaded.

items.name: static let overwrite: ICDownloadOption
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the downloaded file should overwrite an existing file with the same name and extension.

items.name: static let deleteAfterSuccessfulDownload: ICDownloadOption
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether to delete the file from the device after a successful download.

items.name: static let sidecarFiles: ICDownloadOption
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether to download all sidecar files along with the media file.
